object.name: localhost's blog

object.summary: A personal blog with federated posts

test.description: tests whether an ActivityPub Object has a liked collection with an appropriate Collection type
test.name: An ActivityPub Object `liked` Collection Must be a Collection

input.object:
{
  "@context": "https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams",
  "followers": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/followers",
  "following": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/following",
  "id": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/actor",
  "inbox": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/inbox",
  "name": "localhost's blog",
  "outbox": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/outbox",
  "preferredUsername": "blog",
  "publicKey": {
    "id": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/actor#main-key",
    "owner": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/actor",
    "publicKeyPem": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----\n(your public key here)\n-----END PUBLIC KEY-----"
  },
  "summary": "A personal blog with federated posts",
  "type": "Person",
  "url": "http://127.0.0.1:5000"
}

result.info: inputs.object does not have a shares property to test

test.description: This test case tests that an actor's shares collection is an expected kind of collection
test.name: shares collection MUST be either an OrderedCollection or a Collection

input.object:
{
  "@context": "https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams",

test.description: This rule checks whether a given Actor Object has the properties inbox and outbox.
test.name: Actor Objects Must Have Properties inbox and outbox

input.actor:
{
  "@context": "https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams",
  "followers": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/followers",
  "following": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/following",
  "id": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/actor",
  "inbox": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/inbox",
  "name": "localhost's blog",
  "outbox": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/outbox",
  "preferredUsername": "blog",
  "publicKey": {
    "id": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/actor#main-key",
    "owner": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/actor",
    "publicKeyPem": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----\n(your public key here)\n-----END PUBLIC KEY-----"
  },
  "summary": "A personal blog with federated posts",
  "type": "Person",
  "url": "http://127.0.0.1:5000"
}

test.description: This rule checks that URLs of ActivityPub objects can be resolved to a representation with well-known media type for further processing.
test.name: ActivityPub Servers Must Serve Objects in Response to an HTTP GET Request Accepting ActivityStreams 2.0 Media Type

result.info: got 404 response status (not found) when resolving inbox string to inbox object

test.description: This rule checks whether the inbox property of an object appears to be an OrderedCollection
test.name: inbox must be an OrderedCollection

input.object:
{
  "@context": "https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams",
  "followers": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/followers",

  "name": "localhost's blog",
  "outbox": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/outbox",
  "preferredUsername": "blog",
  "publicKey": {
    "id": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/actor#main-key",
    "owner": "http://127.0.0.1:5000/activitypub/actor",
    "publicKeyPem": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----\n(your public key here)\n-----END PUBLIC KEY-----"
  },
  "summary": "A personal blog with federated posts",
  "type": "Person",
  "url": "http://127.0.0.1:5000"
}

test.description: This rule checks whether the outbox property of an object appears to be an OrderedCollection
test.name: outbox must be an OrderedCollection
